mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_emp_mapping (orga_no, emp_no, emp_rank, reg_user) VALUES (#{orgaNo}, #{empNo}, #{empRank}, #{regUser})
mapper.select: SELECT em.emp_rank, em.emp_role, em.orga_no, em.emp_no, em.retired_date, em.hired_date, em.mod_user, em.mod_date, em.reg_user, em.reg_date FROM tbl_emp e JOIN tbl_emp_mapping em ON e.emp_no = em.emp_no JOIN tbl_orga o ON em.orga_no = o.orga_no WHERE username = #{username} AND o.upper_orga_no = (SELECT orga_no FROM tbl_dept_mapping WHERE dept_no = #{deptNo});
